game.name: Volcano Escapes
game.description: Help the stone age hero to cross the lava river. Make the path by dragging the stone blocks. Collect the objects in the block to unlock levels. Avoid colliding with the cannibal and avoid his path. Click/Tap the hero to reverse his walking direction. Drag the block to move them over lava and to place at the correct position.
game.metaTitle: Volcano Escapes, Escaping Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Volcano Escapes at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Volcano Escapes Game, Action Games, Escaping Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
game.mobileControlKeys: SWIPE ON THE SCREEN TO MAKE THE WAY
